languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс шумно выдыхает и вперивается взглядом в труп у своих ног. На его лице возникает горечь.{/n} "Глупо... как глупо... я мог бы допросить... выбить все крупицы информации, что он сумел исторгнуть из Ахиллеаса..." {n}Дознаватель поднимает на вас взгляд, в котором плещется боль.{/n} "Прости. Я... на мгновение помрачнился рассудком. Я больше не допущу подобного. Нет, не допущу". {n}Бросив последний ненавидящий взгляд на мертвого Маражая, Хейнрикс отворачивается.{/n}

{n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは大きなため息をついて足下の死体を見下ろす。不意に孤独に襲われたようだ。{/n}「愚かな…なんと愚かな…。我が奴を尋問していたら…奴がアキレアスから苦労して得た情報を、事細かに聞き出せれば…」{n}ハインリックスは顔を上げてあなたを見る。その視線は苦悩に満ちている。{/n}「すまない。我は…しばし動転していた。もう二度とこんな事態は招かない。決して」{n}事切れたマラズハイを忌々しく一瞥して、ハインリックスは背を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは大きなため息をついて足下の死体を見下ろす。不意に孤独に襲われたようだ。{/n}「愚かな…なんと愚かな…。我が奴を尋問していたら…奴がアキレアスから苦労して得た情報を、事細かに聞き出せれば…」{n}ハインリックスは顔を上げてあなたを見る。その視線は苦悩に満ちている。{/n}「すまない。我は…しばし動転していた。もう二度とこんな事態は招かない。決して」{n}事切れたマラズハイを忌々しく一瞥して、ハインリックスは背を向ける。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希重重地叹了口气，注视着脚边的尸体。他的表情突然变得无比惋惜。{/n}“愚蠢……太愚蠢了……我本可以仔细地审问他……套出他从阿吉里亚斯那里获得的所有信息……”{n}他抬起头，眼神中满是痛苦。{/n}“对不起，都是我……是我被愤怒冲昏了头脑，我绝不会再犯同样的错误。”{n}他带着仇恨的眼神，最后看了一样玛拉斋的尸体，转身离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希重重地叹了口气，注视着脚边的尸体。他的表情突然变得无比惋惜。{/n}“愚蠢……太愚蠢了……我本可以仔细地审问他……套出他从阿吉里亚斯那里获得的所有信息……”{n}他抬起头，眼神中满是痛苦。{/n}“对不起，都是我……是我被愤怒冲昏了头脑，我绝不会再犯同样的错误。”{n}他带着仇恨的眼神，最后看了一样玛拉斋的尸体，转身离开了。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix soupire bruyamment en observant le cadavre gisant à ses pieds. Une tristesse soudaine semble s'être emparée de lui.{/n} « Quel gâchis... Oui, quel gâchis... J'aurais pu l'interroger... lui arracher toutes les informations qu'il avait réussi à obtenir d'Achilleas... {n}dit-il en vous adressant un regard plein de douleur.{/n} Je suis désolé. Je crois que j'ai perdu la tête. Cela ne se reproduira plus. Vous pouvez me croire. » {n}Heinrix se détourne, non sans fusiller le cadavre de Marazhai d'un dernier regard haineux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

J'aurais pu l'interroger... lui arracher toutes les informations qu'il avait réussi à obtenir d'Achilleas... {n}dit-il en vous adressant un regard plein de douleur.{/n} Je suis désolé. Je crois que j'ai perdu la tête. Cela ne se reproduira plus. Vous pouvez me croire. » {n}Heinrix se détourne, non sans fusiller le cadavre de Marazhai d'un dernier regard haineux.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix suspira bruscamente y observa el cadáver que tiene a sus pies. De repente parece desolado.{/n} «Necio... He sido tan necio... Podría haberle interrogado... y sonsacado toda la información que le dio Achilleas...». {n}Te mira con dolor en la mirada.{/n} «Lo siento. No sé... qué me ha podido pasar. No dejaré que vuelva a suceder. No, no lo permitiré». {n}Tras lanzar una última mirada de odio al cadáver de Marazhai, Heinrix se da la vuelta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

No dejaré que vuelva a suceder. No, no lo permitiré». {n}Tras lanzar una última mirada de odio al cadáver de Marazhai, Heinrix se da la vuelta.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix seufzt schwer und betrachtet den Leichnam zu seinen Füßen. Er wirkt mit einem Mal verzweifelt.{/n} "Töricht. So töricht ... Ich hätte ihn verhören können ... hätte jede Information aus ihm herausgeholt, die er von Achilleas hatte ..." {n}Als er zu dir aufsieht, ist sein Blick schmerzerfüllt.{/n} "Verzeiht. Ich ... habe mich für einen Moment vergessen. Das wird nicht wieder vorkommen. Nein, gewiss nicht." {n}Mit einem letzten hasserfüllten Blick auf den toten Marazhai wendet Heinrix sich ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

Ich hätte ihn verhören können ... hätte jede Information aus ihm herausgeholt, die er von Achilleas hatte ..." {n}Als er zu dir aufsieht, ist sein Blick schmerzerfüllt.{/n} "Verzeiht. Ich ... habe mich für einen Moment vergessen. Das wird nicht wieder vorkommen. Nein, gewiss nicht." {n}Mit einem letzten hasserfüllten Blick auf den toten Marazhai wendet Heinrix sich ab.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, derin bir iç çekip ayaklarının dibinde uzanan cesede bakıyor. Birdenbire perperişan oluyor.{/n} "Aptallık ettim... Çok büyük aptallık... Sorguya çekebilirdim... Achilleas'tan öğrendiği her şeyi ağzından alırdım..." {n}Başını kaldırıp acı içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim. Bir anlığına... Aklım başımdan gitti. Bir daha böyle olmayacak. Buna müsaade etmeyeceğim." {n}Heinrix, Marazhai'ın cesedine nefret dolu son bir bakış attıktan sonra arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix sighs heavily and stares down at the corpse at his feet. He looks suddenly forlorn.{/n} "Foolish... So foolish... I could have interrogated him... extracted every bit of information he managed to get from Achilleas..." {n}He looks up at you, his gaze filled with pain.{/n} "I'm sorry. I... lost my head for a moment. I will not let it happen again. No, I won't." {n}Casting one last hateful glance at the dead Marazhai, Heinrix turns away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix derin bir iç çekip ayaklarının dibinde uzanan cesede bakıyor. Birdenbire perişan duruyor.{/n} "Aptallık ettim... Çok büyük aptallık... Sorguya çekebilirdim... Achilleas'tan öğrendiği her şeyi ağzından alırdım..." {n}Başını kaldırıp acı içinde sana bakıyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim. Bir anlığına... Aklım başımdan gitti. Bir daha olmasına izin vermeyeceğim. Bir daha yaşanmayacak." {n}Heinrix, Marazhai'ın cesedine nefret dolu son bir bakış attıktan sonra arkasını dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
